### 4.3 CNRP Protocol Flow

```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    participant Clock as System Clock
    participant R4 as R4: VEGA<br/>Integrity
    participant R1 as R1: CEIO<br/>Evidence
    participant R2 as R2: CRIO<br/>Graph
    participant R3 as R3: CDMO<br/>Hygiene
    participant DB as PostgreSQL

    Clock->>R4: Trigger
    R4->>DB: Hash verification
    R4-->>Clock: 6 records verified

    R4->>R1: Gate pass
    R1->>DB: Evidence refresh
    R1-->>Clock: 383 records

    R1->>R2: Gate pass
    R2->>DB: Alpha graph rebuild
    R2-->>Clock: 358 records

    R2->>R3: Gate pass
    R3->>DB: Hygiene attestation
    R3-->>Clock: 5 records
```

## 7. System Architecture Flow

### 7.1 Signal Flow Evolution (Day 20 → Day 22)

**Day 20 (BROKEN):**
```
Golden Needles → (NOT CONNECTED) → IoS-013 (EMPTY) → Execution
```

**Day 22 (OPERATIONAL):**
```mermaid
flowchart TB
    subgraph Sources[Signal Sources]
        GN[Golden Needles<br/>39 HOLD signals]
        G1[G1 Validated<br/>89 HOLD + 11 ENTRY_LONG]
    end

    subgraph Aggregation[IoS-013 Aggregation Layer]
        AGG[ios013_signal_aggregator.py]
        SIG[fhq_research.signals<br/>139 total]
    end

    subgraph Weighting[Signal Weighting]
        WGT[ios013_signal_weighting_engine.py]
        WSP[fhq_signal_context.weighted_signal_plan]
    end

    subgraph Execution[Execution Layer]
        LINE[LINE Execution Gateway]
        ALPACA[Alpaca Paper Broker]
    end

    GN --> AGG
    G1 --> AGG
    AGG --> SIG
    SIG --> WGT
    WGT --> WSP
    WSP --> LINE
    LINE --> ALPACA
```

### 7.2 Complete System Architecture

```mermaid
flowchart TB
    subgraph Data_Layer[Data Layer]

    end

        D1[g2_decision_plans]
        D2[EC-015 CPTO<br/>Precision Transform]
        D3[LINE Gateway]
        D4[Alpaca Paper<br/>30 orders]
    end

    subgraph Governance_Layer[Governance Layer]
        E1[VEGA Attestation]
        E2[CNRP Protocol<br/>4 cycles Day 22]
        E3[governance_actions_log<br/>10,610 records]
    end

    A1 --> B1
    A2 --> B1
    A4 --> C1
    B1 --> B2
    B2 --> B3

    B3 --> C1
    A3 --> C1
    C1 --> C2
    C2 --> C3
    C2 --> C4
    C4 --> C5

    C5 --> D1
    D1 --> D2
    D2 --> D3
    D3 --> D4

    E1 -.-> D2
    E2 -.-> A3
    D2 --> E3
    D3 --> E3
```
